content: अभियोक्तृ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Assailing, attacking, accusing. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (क्ता) {@--1@} An enemy, assailant, invader; त्वय्युत्कृष्टबलेऽ भियोक्तरि नृपे <ls>Mu. 4. 15</ls>; <ls>H. 3. 93.</ls> {@--2@} (In law) A complainant, plaintiff, accuser, prosecutor; <ls>Ms. 8. 52</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">58</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 95.</ls> {@--3@} A pretender, claimant; a stronger party.
